extendedInfo.description: love is 58, moon is 32, dog is 17, memory is 334...Do you know the trick behind this?The Major System is a powerful mnemonic technique to memorize numbers.You need to invest some time to use it comfortably, but after that, you can memorize all sorts of numbers, such as phone numbers, passwords, birthdays and etc.This application helps you to learn it with a lot of example words and simple yet effective practices. Enjoy learning new skill for everyday life!Keywordsmnemonic, memory skill, recollection, learning, brain training, numbers, mental math, mental arithmetic

reviews.title: The only option for Android
reviews.comment: I feel very lucky that the only Major System practice app for Android is this good.  Generally excellent and does the job... Very easy to use every day to make the major system second nature. Excellent tool.
reviews.author: Brian Mosley

reviews.title: Good apps for learning the Major Peg System.
reviews.comment: This is a good apps for learning the major peg system.   Pretty easy to use and understand.  Through having a good keyboard will help.  Has some foibles that need to be fixed.  Nothing major just would make this more fun and easier to use.  On the Real Practice, it would be nice to see where I went wrong when I fail. The game just gives me the score and no clue to what I did wrong?  Another idea to make Real Practice a little harder is make the person wait a time before entering in the numbers.   Allow the person to absorb words/numbers in long term memory rather then short term memory.  With Basic Practice, it would be interesting if after entering words, a person can be tested on the numbers they just entered.  A step up would before the Real Practice.  Also in the Statistics it gives me my aveverage for each number, good.  But it also gives the average for the over 100 numbers which I have never been tested on?   Why not implement that with the Basic Practice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Very nice app for practicing the Major System. The only thing I would like to see fixed is a problem when entering the wrong answer on the TF300T using the keyboard. When you press enter it will log it as 2 wrong answers and not one, using up 2 of your 3 attempts. Would give 5 stars if it wasn\'t for that as I would love to be able to use it on my tablet WITH the keyboard.    Great apps still.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Learning
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried flash cards and all sorts of ways to learn the major system but I could never make a habit of it. I\'ve finally learned the major system with this simple app that is fun and easy.
reviews.author: Rodney Zhu

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works well, no bugs and I\'ve been using it for a while. I already know the system but this is the Perfect tool to help me improve. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have been trying to learn the major system. This app helps with the practicing by making it a game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well now after the last update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Protection sucks!
reviews.comment: As a paying customer i hate the fact that the licensing program blocks me from using this app every few hours. Otherwise its pretty good :-)
reviews.author: A Google User
